issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem is not completely described.
resolution.name: Incomplete

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
Today only the ~vector.mapjoin.optimized hash table -- which is a thin shell over MapJoinBytesTableContainer / HybridHashTableContainer and BytesBytesMutliHashMap -- is Hybrid Grace capable.

Make the ~vector.mapjoin.fast hash table Hybrid Grace capable.
fields.summary: Make new fast hash table for Native Vector Map Join work with Hybrid Grace

comments.body: Is there any planned work on this in the scope of 2.0 release?
